|relationships = [[Annabel]] (one date)}}'''Todd "The Hombre Man"''' is a cologne spritzer for the cologne ''Hombre''. He competes with [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] in "[[The One With The Breast Milk]]". He is portrayed by [[Joel Beeson]].

==Trivia==
*Joel Beeson, who portrayed the Hombre Man, was the spokesmodel for Preferred Stock men's cologne in the early 90's.
*"Hombre" means "man" in Spanish.
